english.segment1: I got a new way of thinking. I finally figured it out. It's coming from a different perspective. I wanna tell you what it's about. And I'm all right now (all right now). Cause it's You I've found
english.segment2: Yeah, Your love's contagious and I've caught it. Can't wipe this smile off my face, it's something I can't explain. Yeah, Your joy's outrageous and I got it. I'm leaving worries behind, it's something I can't describe
english.segment3: Singin' na na na na na na na na na na na. Singin' na na na na na na na na na na na
english.segment4: I got a new motivation. I never knew how good it could be. It's better than a standing ovation. And nothings gonna take it from me. And I'll be fine (I'll be fine). Cause You're by my side
english.segment5: Yeah, Your love's contagious and I've caught it. Can't wipe this smile off my face, it's something I can't explain. Yeah, Your joy's outrageous and I got it. I'm leaving worries behind, it's something I can't describe
english.segment7: You can put it in your pocket for another day. You can hide it in a box or keep it locked away. But when it's in your heart you'll find. You don't have to wonder why. You won't need a vision. You won't need a sign. It's something I can't define
english.segment8: Singin' na na na na na na na na na na. Singin' na na na na na na na na na na
english.segment9: Yeah, Your love's contagious and I've caught it. Can't wipe this smile off my face, it's something I can't explain. Yeah, Your joy's outrageous and I got it. I'm leaving worries behind, it's something I can't describe
english.segment10: Yeah, Your love's contagious and I've caught it. Can't wipe this smile off my face, it's something I can't explain. Yeah, Your joy's outrageous and I got it. I'm leaving worries behind, it's something I can't describe
english.segment11: Singin' na na na na na na na na na na. Singin' na na na na na na na na na na
